categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Darth Atroxa was a Lethan Twi'lek female who was a Sith Lord of the Sith Empire. During the Eternal Empire's campaigns against the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic, Atroxa took control of the forces defending the Sith homeworld of Korriban, but was slain by Prince Arcann of the Eternal Empire.
